metadata.title: Science vs Religion | On how the Universe was Born
metadata.description:
Kuku FM Learning App Link - https://kukufm.sng.link/Apksi/8v26/b2rg

Use COUPON CODE - GETSET50 to get (50% OFF) for Rs. 199/year (Valid for Only FIRST 500 SUBSCRIBERS)
  
OR
Getset20 - (20% OFF) All-time valid.


Hello friends, do you know that Hinduism is one of the oldest Religions on the Earth, almost 4000 years old, but wait… Science is also as old as the birth of Religion. So, who came first: Science or Religion? Well, according to religion Brahma is said to be the creator of the universe
